description_points.main: Develop and enhance codebase, elevating team dynamics and efficiency
subs: Create component based library of reusable Angular components (with storybook implementation), slimming down build size and adding consistency to the team’s design principles
Integrate asynchronous promise based API protocol, eliminating nested callbacks in Node
Integrate code standard to protect against SQL injection and other security concerns
Introduce and execute new integration testing platform
Develop novel email analytics platform integrating with third party APIs, webhooks, and monitoring services
Upgrade frontend stack through 2 major Angular release versions, incorporate Ivy compiler
Introduce new flat graph model in order to integrate new GraphQL middleware layer

description_points.main: Lead, develop, and maintain developer internship program
subs: Mentor incoming junior engineers and interns through the lifecycle of their experience at AVIA

Act as primary point of contact, guiding team members through onboarding, environment setup, exposure and integration of our stack, skill hardening via consistent teaching and pairing sessions, and management/1:1 meetings.

description_points.main: Introduce and Implement team scrum/agile policies and procedures
subs: Lead daily stand meeting outlining blockers with specific follow up tasks
Participate in ‘scrum of scrums’ meeting with other leads, syncing and sharing out celebrations and impediments with upper management
Aide in bi-weekly sprint planning, delineation, and organization

description_points.main: Develop and improve overall product architecture/codebase
subs: Develop, design, and implement application knowledge using Ruby on Rails, React, GraphQL. Build and iterate upon functional component code base
Improve unit, integration and E2E test coverage
Collaborate/contribute on sprints that align with key roadmap items and will advance building Tier 2 Support capacity

description_points.main: Own and manage all Support Functions
subs: Work directly with internal and external stakeholders to understand support issues, and provide context, metrics, documentation for effective solutions
Prioritize and manage backlog of Tier 2 support features/functionalities with other Team Leads
Own Jira project and ZenDesk Support trends - deliver tickets and/or push them to the appropriate teams

description_points.main: Create and iterate upon ThinkCERCAMP, a professional development program with a growth mindset focus exploring the paradigms and processes to learn coding and engineering empathy across the company
subs: Develop curriculum to guide coworkers through self-directed programming modules with real-world deliverables
Lead instruction and content delivery

description_points.main: Refine, document and evolve the Tier 1 and Tier 2 support processes
subs: Build, iterate and document support tools
Train additional engineers in support processes as well as command line support tools

description_points.main: Celebrate and improve culture across the team, implementing positive change through understanding, collaboration, and new initiatives
Use insights from support work and success tickets to help inform feature iterations and architectural planning of new epics
Mentor and assist teaching Northwestern Web Development students through a fullstack program
subs: Guide students in developing confidence and proficiency in: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Node.js, React.js, Git, Command Line, MySQL, Ruby on Rails, Sequelize, Express, SQL, noSQL, Tableau

description_points.main: Code Platoon Credo: Understand that good software developers don’t just know how to code; they have emotional intelligence that allows them to give and receive feedback, and they understand that often the way forward is through pure grit and determination
Help model and advance students' skills

company: Niles Township District For Special Education
